page.title: 12MEDIA IN LLANBRYNMAIR
page.content: In Llanbrynmair we have four television channels which are{BBC1 },{ {BBC2, HTV }and {S4C }.We have lots of daily newspapers like {The Western {Mail,Daily Post,Daily Telegraph,The {Sun,Daily Mirror,Guardian }and some others.Every evening we have{The {Shropshire Star}.The {Cambrian News}, {The County Times }and a Welsh weekly paper called{Y Cymro}are our weekly papers.We also every month have a newspaper called {Y Blewyn Glas}that tells us about special things that have happened or are happening in our area and the areas around us.We have several programmes on the radio including our own Welsh programmes which are broadcast by {Radio Cymru}. We also have an English programme from Wales called {Radio Wales}.
